title: a pretty 'scary' movie
review: A pretty nice film, but BWP is IMHO very realistic in the way the actors act: It could be real: My Tip => Watch this Film without reading any critics before...Then the effect would be the best.Another reason, why i like this film is because itÂ´s pretty unusual, that such a film (which looks very low-budged) went to such a (commercial) Blockbuster.At last you would like the film - or hate it...;)
